title: to-do
body: Finish laundry, buy groceries, go to the gym

title: Elephants
body: Elephants remember everything. They are pregnant for 2 years.

title: Pokemon
body: I am an OG Pokemon lover. I remember when it was all just fun and games. Now it's about money, and scalpers are taking the fun away from everyone.

title: Stocks
body: Have you seen Doge Coin lately? I remember laughing about it 4 years ago when it was a fraction of a cent. Well, look who's laughing now... Doge Coin...
